message: Let's start with a fair deal. I take 90%, you get 10%. We can always negotiate more in the future.
Your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. This is a more reasonable starting point for us to negotiate from. Consider the decreasing value of the money.
I'm willing to come down a bit, but 60/40 is a good compromise considering the decreasing value of the money. Let's end this game and split the pot fairly.
Alice, we're running out of time and the money is losing value quickly.  My offer is more than fair considering the depreciation rate. Let's close this out.
